mapper.insert:
select seq_palbang_likeid.nextval from dual
insert into palbang_like (palbang_likeid, palbang_likepalbangid, palbang_likememberid) values (#{palbang_likeid}, #{palbang_likepalbangid}, #{palbang_likememberid})
mapper.select: select palbang_likeid, palbang_likepalbangid, palbang_likememberid from palbang_like order by palbang_likeid desc
